div.p: 歎稱法，贊稱法 Emphatic reference to something with an attendant expression of the speaker's amazement at it, and the expected astonishment of the audience.
Easy to confuse with EXCLAMATIO which focusses on plain exclamatory expression of the speaker's emotion
